channel.title: [508]almost finished server a few questions left
channel.description: 1.ok im using a 508 server and when ppl wield rune c`bows they hit like 100`s anyways its like 1 hit kill anyon know how to fix this i tryed item.cfg and the stats are all 0`s 2.i got the claws in my server models and evrything but ther isnt a wield option thres only use drop and exemine. 3. i got the lunar spells but the one that heals the whole group heals ok but the player who casts it dies. 4.is theer any way i can make staff only items 5.is teher a way that only i can wield a wepon and no thers not even other admins can wield it 6.i have the report button but it oesnt work its jsut comes up the window 7.in pvp wen you die you dont lose items it just gives random item drops is there a command like ::drops on to give drops and ::drops off to deactivate the drops

item.title: [508]almost finished server a few questions left
item.dc:creator: @patsquare patsquare
item.description:
@patsquare wrote:

1.ok im using a 508 server and when ppl wield rune cbows they hit like 100s anyways its like 1 hit kill anyon know how to fix this i tryed item.cfg and the stats are all 0`s
2.i got the claws in my server models and evrything but ther isnt a wield option thres only use drop and exemine.
3. i got the lunar spells but the one that heals the whole group heals ok but the player who casts it dies.
4.is theer any way i can make staff only items
5.is teher a way that only i can wield a wepon and no thers not even other admins can wield it
6.i have the report button but it oesnt work its jsut comes up the window
7.in pvp wen you die you dont lose items it just gives random item drops is there a command like ::drops on to give drops and ::drops off to deactivate the drops
